name: Arcade Of Horror
description:
Survive the Cursed Arcade called Fun And Games 

Story: Fun And Games is a Arcade It was opened in 1981 at USA New York Weehawken Bladwin Ave and 1981 is where Arcade Games became Famous 

Fun And Games got over 1,000 Players and when in 1995 Fun And Games Added

Neo Geo on there Location Fun and Games got over 3,200,000

Fun and Games became Famous in until in 2002 10 Players at Fun And Games

Got Control by Demons it was so bad that Fun and Games had to 

Shut Down..
